title: (x) Bacardi logo - (similar to) Nevada {Dav}
content:
I need a font ID'd if anyone can help. Please go to [www.bacardi.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130323145538/http:/www.bacardi.com/ "www.bacardi.com") and on the very first page you come to, look at the welcome line in gold. I need to know what font 'BACARDI' is written in as a client has seen it and likes it. I'm sure I've used this before for something else but can't put my finger on it! Any help - greatly appreciated.

A.
author: antony

comments.content: Well, I am almost sure that the 'Bacardi' logo type is custom..

I'm sure I've used something really similar though. The C does look out of place as if it's been custom made especially where it runs into the A but it's the BA at the beginning that I recognise as familiar...

ANT:ONY

Thanks! I used Nevada, pulled and pushed it around a bit and have exactly what I need. Cheers for the help.

ANT:ONY
